resources.string: Network error. Please try again later
Please hold your Glasses close to your phone
Please confirm pairing on the Glasses
Click to confirm to start the location service
Click to confirm to enable Bluetooth permissions and location permissions
Click OK to turn on Bluetooth
If the device is not scanned, you can try to "scan the code to add" or "re-scan"

1. Please confirm that the device that needs to be connected has Bluetooth function enabled and detection function enabled, and the battery is sufficient. If the Bluetooth function is not turned on or the battery is low, it will cause the device to be unable to be searched;

2. Please ensure that the searched device is not connected to any other Bluetooth devices of the same type. If so, please disconnect and pair again. The searched device has been paired with other devices, which may result in being unable to be searched;

3. Please ensure that the phone connected to has enabled location service permissions and is within a valid range (10 meters), and the Bluetooth switch is turned on. If the two devices are too far away, it will result in inability to search;
The device has been bound. Please unbind it first
This will clear all data about the device from the phone and glasses \n\nAfter the device is deleted, if it is used again, it needs to be added again
Device not connected, please check the device status
When enabled, both the source language and the target language will be displayed on the glasses simultaneously
